alert.note: Alert for Chiricahua Mountains including Chiricahua National Monument (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 11 at 1:38PM MST until January 11 at 7:00PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 7 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, west winds 40 to 50 mph with gusts up to 70 mph expected. For the Wind Advisory, west winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Chiricahua Mountains. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, until 5 PM MST this afternoon. For the Wind Advisory, from 5 PM this afternoon to 7 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Chiricahua Mountains including Chiricahua National Monument
